Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

```

```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728", "USW00022534", "USS0023B17S"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2021-01-01",
    date_max = "2022-12-31") |>
  mutate(
    name = recode(
      id, 
      USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY", 
      USW00022534 = "Molokai_HI",
      USS0023B17S = "Waterhole_WA"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) |>
  select(name, everything())
```

### Chart A

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(
    text_label = str_c("Price: $", price, "\nRating: ", rating)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x= ~lat, y= ~long, color = ~price, text = ~text_label,
    alpha = 0.5, type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, price)) %>% 
  plot_ly(y= ~price, x= ~neighbourhood, type = "box", color = ~neighbourhood, colors = "viridis")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  count(neighbourhood) %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~neighbourhood, y= ~n, color = ~neighbourhood, 
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
